name: Rincewind's Pawn Shop
description:
They say they fought a dragon for their loot, but did they? Wheel and deal with adventurers looking to sell their would be loot to earn money for rent. But beware humble pawner not everyone is as honest as they seem. Deduce for yourself which items are real and which are not at Rincewind's Pawn Shop.

Click "Next" to skip current Customer or move on after buying their item.

Github Repo:

https://github.com/OniBakuu/RincewindsPawnShop
